# find-similar-and-list
## Installation
```
pip install find-similar-and-list
```

## How to use
```
usage: find-similar-and-list [-h] [--files FILES [FILES ...]]
                             [--ignore-file IGNORE_FILE]

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --files FILES [FILES ...]
                        Files to filter
  --ignore-file IGNORE_FILE
```
